sentences.sContent: Installing double-glazing will cut down the noise from traffic.
sentences.sContent_eng: Installing double-glazing will cut down the noise from traffic.
sentences.sCn: 安装双层玻璃可以减少交通噪声。

sentences.sContent: It comes complete with double-glazing and can be upgraded to include a guttering kit, laminate flooring and even underfloor heating.
sentences.sContent_eng: It comes complete with double-glazing and can be upgraded to include a guttering kit, laminate flooring and even underfloor heating.
sentences.sCn: 小木屋配有双层玻璃窗，之后也可加装排水管道、复合地板和地板下方的加热系统，以此来完成房屋升级。

sentences.sContent: Skin made by the metal and liner made by double-glazing.
sentences.sContent_eng: Skin made by the metal and liner made by double-glazing.
sentences.sCn: 外皮由铁皮制成，内装双层玻璃制成的瓶胆。

trans.tranOther: two panes of glass in a window, fitted to reduce the transmission of heat, sound, etc
